name: Paradise Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A PARADISE file is a file that has been encrypted by Paradise ransomware, which is malware distributed by cybercriminals. It contains a file, such as a .JPG, .DOCX, .XLSX, .MP4, or .MP3 file, that has been renamed and encrypted by the virus. PARADISE files can be decrypted for free using the Emsisoft Decryptor for Paradise utility.
